item.description:
Our second release of our Estate Grown Beaujolais wine. Its a French tradition, a mild, fruity red wine to get the population through the winter. Come enjoy the Beaujolais festivities without having to go to France!.


Please call to reserve your preferred cellar tour and tasting time: 12, 2 or 4pm Saturday and 12pm or 2pm Sunday.


Upstairs, in the winery, you will have the chance to enjoy culinary snacks and treats of sorts, live music and the chance to purchase our newly released wine. Our winery features back to back fire-places and a newly appointed lounge area that make lingering on a chilly winters day quite enjoyable.


Post-tasting, relax by the fire with a glass of Hot Apple Cider , Hot Cocoa or purchase Wine by the Glass or Hot Mulled wine.


Limited Release HB wine glass, Hot Chocolate & Hot Apple cider included in $25 ticket price.
